The most common reaction is\\, 'How can you be depressed? You have everything going for you. You are the supposed number one heroine and have a plush home\\, car\\, movies... What else do you want?'

author: Mary Pickford
quote: Make them laugh\\, make them cry\\, and hack to laughter. What do people go to the theatre for? An emotional exercise. I am a servant of the people. I have never forgotten that.

author: Elvis Presley
quote: When I was a boy\\, I always saw myself as a hero in comic books and in movies. I grew up believing this dream.

author: Steven Spielberg
quote: The most amazing thing for me is that every single person who sees a movie\\, not necessarily one of my movies\\, brings a whole set of unique experiences. Now\\, through careful manipulation and good storytelling\\, you can get everybody to clap at the same time\\, to hopefully laugh at the same time\\, and to be afraid at the same time.

author: Jean-Luc Godard
quote: A story should have a beginning\\, a middle and an end\\, but not necessarily in that order.

author: Alfred Hitchcock
quote: Always make the audience suffer as much as possible.

author: Harbhajan Singh
quote: Cricket is my passion; it is my first love. So I will not act in my movies\\, as they will just be a side business for me.

author: Tommy Wiseau
quote: When I was a little kid\\, I wanted to be\\, like\\, you know\\, a movie star\\, you know? Or\\, I always have interest in movie\\, you know? Because I like the visual aspect of the movies\\, et cetera.

author: Andy Warhol
quote: People sometimes say the way things happen in the movies is unreal\\, but actually\\, it's the way things happen to you in life that's unreal.

author: Adam Duritz
quote: If dreams are like movies\\, then memories are films about ghosts.

author: Audrey Hepburn
quote: Everything I learned I learned from the movies.

author: Alejandro Gonzalez Inarritu
quote: Movies become art after editing. Instead of just reproducing reality\\, they juxtapose images of it. That implies expression; that's art.

author: Karan Johar
quote: My mother was keen that I complete my graduation and never ever wanted me to be in the movies\\, as my father had made five films that lost money. One of the films he made was 'Agneepath\\,' which was hugely hyped but underwhelming at the box office\\, and I remember that my dad had to sell my grandmother's flat to pay off the loan.

author: Leonardo DiCaprio
quote: I really hate relaxing. I've done three movies in a row\\, worked for two years straight\\, and to me\\, idle time is the devil's workshop. I like to focus on something.

author: Marilyn Manson
quote: Jesus is a half-naked guy\\, hanging\\, nailed to a cross\\, and then people wear that around their neck\\, and then those are the people that are upset about violence in movies.

author: Christina Ricci
quote: My dream role would probably be a psycho killer\\, because the whole thing I love about movies is that you get to do things you could never do in real life\\, and that would be my way of vicariously experiencing being a psycho killer. Also\\, it's incredibly romantic.

author: Peter Jackson
quote: 100 years ago\\, movies were black-and-white\\, silent\\, and 16 frames a second. So 100 years from now\\, what are they going to be?

author: George Lucas
quote: I was going to go to a four-year college and be an anthropologist or to an art school and be an illustrator when a friend convinced me to learn photography at the University of Southern California. Little did I know it was a school that taught you how to make movies! It had never occurred to me that I'd ever have any interest in filmmaking.

author: Samuel L. Jackson
quote: Not everybody goes to movies to get their life changed.

author: Yitzhak Rabin
quote: I think that life in Israel is sometimes bigger than the movies.

author: D. B. Sweeney
quote: The great thing for me about 'The Resurrection of Gavin Stone' is it's a throwback to the old fashioned Hollywood movie that you can watch with your family\\, has a message\\, and is funny and entertaining. They didn't call them faith-based movies; they just called them good movies.

author: Burt Reynolds
quote: My movies were the kind they show in prisons and airplanes\\, because nobody can leave.

author: Ben Foster
quote: I don't watch most of the movies I'm in. Ever. They're like a bad relationship where\\, after you break up\\, you don't want to look over all the valentines.

author: Zooey Deschanel
quote: I like old movies\\, screwball comedies\\, vintage clothes\\, and basically I'm an old-fashioned gal.

author: Monica Bellucci
quote: We all need illusions. That's why we love movies.

author: Larry the Cable Guy
quote: I was always a fan of the old-style comics. I loved vaudeville. I loved Milton Berle\\, Dick Shawn\\, Phyllis Diller\\, Don Rickles\\, Charlie Callas\\, all those guys. Hilarious. I love the Bing Crosby and Bob Hope movies\\, and Abbott & Costello. My television influences were 'Monty Python's Flying Circus\\,' 'Benny Hill\\,' and 'Hee Haw.'

author: George Lucas
quote: If the boy and girl walk off into the sunset hand-in-hand in the last scene\\, it adds 10 million to the box office.

author: Mel Brooks
quote: A cinema villain essentially needs a moustache so he can twiddle with it gleefully as he cooks up his next nasty plan.

author: Pedro Almodovar
quote: I don't want to imitate life in movies; I want to represent it. And in that representation\\, you use the colors you feel\\, and sometimes they are fake colors. But always it's to show one emotion.

author: David Gerrold
quote: What's interesting about the shift from an industrial age to a technological age is that we keep inventing new media: movies\\, records\\, radio\\, television\\, the Internet\\, and now ebooks - and one of the things that's most interesting about the invention of a new medium is watching it reinvent itself as it penetrates the culture.

author: John Wayne
quote: Nobody should come to the movies unless he believes in heroes.

author: Tim Burton
quote: In Hollywood\\, they think drawn animation doesn't work anymore\\, computers are the way. They forget that the reason computers are the way is that Pixar makes good movies. So everybody tries to copy Pixar. They're relying too much on the technology and not enough on the artists.

author: Joe Manganiello
quote: I was kind of a dark kid. I loved Halloween\\, and I loved vampires and the black and white old monster movies.

author: Charlotte Ronson
quote: I like to go out\\, but sometimes it's nice to stay cozy at home\\, watching movies or TV\\, especially early in the week.

author: Jordan Peele
quote: I was a very scared child. Not\\, you know\\, not so much of life but of the demons that lurked in the dark. And horror movies terrified me. You know\\, I'd love watching them but then at night\\, I would just be up in sweats all night.

author: Carrie Fisher
quote: Movies are dreams! And they work on you subliminally.

author: John Williams
quote: I was never that into the movies. Never. Even as a youngster. I became interested in movie music only because of the studio orchestras in Hollywood.

author: David Fincher
quote: Some people go to the movies to be reminded that everything's okay. I don't make those kinds of movies.

author: George Lucas
quote: The secret to film is that it's an illusion.

author: Alice Cooper
quote: Why be boring? Have some fun. Rock shows should be like movies: I don't go to a movie hoping it'll change my life.

author: Lee Marvin
quote: I only make movies to finance my fishing.

author: Maya Angelou
quote: I never expected anyone to take care of me\\, but in my wildest dreams and juvenile yearnings\\, I wanted the house with the picket fence from June Allyson movies. I knew that was yearning like one yearns to fly.

author: Quentin Tarantino
quote: Movies are my religion and God is my patron. I'm lucky enough to be in the position where I don't make movies to pay for my pool. When I make a movie\\, I want it to be everything to me; like I would die for it.

author: Jim Carroll
quote: I love kids that come to shows\\, little kids coming up to you with braces; like\\, some kid came up to me in a parking lot outside a show in Santa Cruz - he was about 14 or 15 - and he said\\, 'Y'know\\, I love 'The Basketball Diaries\\,' but I hope your next book of poetry isn't gonna be as academic as 'Living at the Movies' was.'

author: Arnold Schwarzenegger
quote: I was striving to be the most muscular man\\, and it got me into the movies. It got me everything that I have.

author: Marc Jacobs
quote: My relationship with fashion has always been that each of us stars in our own movies and costumes ourselves to play the part we want. You take blouses and jeans and dresses\\, and you put them together\\, and they tell your story.

author: Cam Newton
quote: My place of refuge is definitely watching movies and playing video games. I know that's kind of hard to fathom.

author: Eric Schlosser
quote: Like Hollywood movies\\, MTV and blue jeans\\, fast food has become one of America's major cultural exports.

author: Salman Khan
quote: In the past\\, I had a knee-jerk approach to work\\, and it showed on screen. I was doing movies for the wrong reasons - trying to juggle dates\\, do too many guest appearances\\, take up projects under pressure or for emotional reasons.

author: Hailee Steinfeld
quote: I love to hang out with my friends and go to the movies. My mom and I are involved in the Mother/Daughter Organization - national charity work. Whenever I get free time\\, we volunteer. It's an organization so mothers and daughters can spend time together while volunteering.

author: Orson Welles
quote: I've never understood the cult of Hitchcock. Particularly the late American movies... Egotism and laziness. And they're all lit like television shows.

author: Nick Cave
quote: If beautiful movies can influence you to go out and hug your children\\, then we have to be honest and say that other movies can inspire you to do bad things.

author: Al Pacino
quote: When my mother got home from work\\, she would take me to the movies. It was her way of getting out\\, and she would take me with her. I'd go home and act all the parts. It had a tremendous influence on my becoming an actor.

author: Christopher Nolan
quote: I think there's a vague sense out there that movies are becoming more and more unreal. I know I've felt it.

author: Gene Wilder
quote: The thing I love about making movies is the peace of mind that I know I don't have to be perfect the first time. I can be perfect the second time or the third time.

author: Ali Fazal
quote: Everyone is using the Internet for almost everything - trailers\\, ads\\, movies\\, and short films. This is the only thing that will reach everybody in the world.

author: Samuel L. Jackson
quote: I grew up watching those blaxploitation movies. Ron O'Neal\\, Richard Roundtree\\, Jim Brown\\, Pam Grier. For the first time\\, I saw 'The Negro' get one over on 'The Man.'

author: Vincent Cassel
quote: I think American audiences like gangster movies. You know\\, it's part of the culture.

author: Victor LaValle
quote: One of the reasons I love devils so much is not based in my faith\\, but because as a kid\\, I grew up loving heavy metal and horror movies\\, and the devil is such a huge presence in both.

author: Ralph Fiennes
quote: So much of movie acting is in the lighting. And in loving your characters. I try to know them\\, and with that intimacy comes love. And now\\, I love Voldemort.

author: Carole Bouquet
quote: My characters always start well in movies. Almost every movie I've done starts with a happy marriage\\, it's all beautiful\\, wealthy\\, whatever... and then of course my husband leaves me\\, and everything falls apart.

author: Martin Scorsese
quote: Cinema is a matter of what's in the frame and what's out.

author: Federico Fellini
quote: Talking about dreams is like talking about movies\\, since the cinema uses the language of dreams; years can pass in a second\\, and you can hop from one place to another. It's a language made of image. And in the real cinema\\, every object and every light means something\\, as in a dream.

author: Wes Craven
quote: Some people ask why people would go into a dark room to be scared. I say they are already scared\\, and they need to have that fear manipulated and massaged. I think of horror movies as the disturbed dreams of a society.

author: Audrey Hepburn
quote: I never thought I'd land in pictures with a face like mine.

author: Robin Williams
quote: Sometimes over things that I did\\, movies that didn't turn out very well - you go\\, 'Why did you do that?' But in the end\\, I can't regret them because I met amazing people. There was always something that was worth it.

author: Jean Cocteau
quote: A film is a petrified fountain of thought.

author: Lauren Ambrose
quote: Right now I just want to chill for a while. Take a hiatus from all the craziness. To clean my house\\, see my family. Just see some movies and pick some strawberries.

author: Hubert H. Humphrey
quote: The greatest healing therapy is friendship and love.

author: Carrie Underwood
quote: Every day is a new day\\, and you'll never be able to find happiness if you don't move on.

author: Walter Anderson
quote: Bad things do happen; how I respond to them defines my character and the quality of my life. I can choose to sit in perpetual sadness\\, immobilized by the gravity of my loss\\, or I can choose to rise from the pain and treasure the most precious gift I have - life itself.

author: Johnny Cash
quote: You build on failure. You use it as a stepping stone. Close the door on the past. You don't try to forget the mistakes\\, but you don't dwell on it. You don't let it have any of your energy\\, or any of your time\\, or any of your space.

author: Robert Frost
quote: In three words I can sum up everything I've learned about life: it goes on.

author: Seneca
quote: Every new beginning comes from some other beginning's end.

author: Helen Keller
quote: So long as the memory of certain beloved friends lives in my heart\\, I shall say that life is good.

author: Ernie Harwell
quote: It's time to say goodbye\\, but I think goodbyes are sad and I'd much rather say hello. Hello to a new adventure.

author: Denis Waitley
quote: Don't dwell on what went wrong. Instead\\, focus on what to do next. Spend your energies on moving forward toward finding the answer.

author: Dave Pelzer
quote: To help yourself\\, you must be yourself. Be the best that you can be. When you make a mistake\\, learn from it\\, pick yourself up and move on.

author: Albert Camus
quote: Blessed are the hearts that can bend; they shall never be broken.

author: Lewis B. Smedes
quote: Forgiving does not erase the bitter past. A healed memory is not a deleted memory. Instead\\, forgiving what we cannot forget creates a new way to remember. We change the memory of our past into a hope for our future.

author: Carlos Santana
quote: If you carry joy in your heart\\, you can heal any moment.

author: Anne Roiphe
quote: Grief is in two parts. The first is loss. The second is the remaking of life.

author: Dave Mustaine
quote: Moving on\\, is a simple thing\\, what it leaves behind is hard.

author: Jennifer Aniston
quote: I think it's important to have closure in any relationship that ends - from a romantic relationship to a friendship. You should always have a sense of clarity at the end and know why it began and why it ended. You need that in your life to move cleanly into your next phase.

author: Theodore Roosevelt
quote: It is only through labor and painful effort\\, by grim energy and resolute courage\\, that we move on to better things.

author: Nelson Mandela
quote: Forget the past.

author: Khalil Gibran
quote: If you love somebody\\, let them go\\, for if they return\\, they were always yours. And if they don't\\, they never were.

author: Joyce Meyer
quote: Feeling sorry for ourselves is the most useless waste of energy on the planet. It does absolutely no good. We can't let our circumstances or what others do or don't do control us. We can decide to be happy regardless.

author: Jane Austen
quote: Friendship is certainly the finest balm for the pangs of disappointed love.

author: Sai Baba
quote: Love one another and help others to rise to the higher levels\\, simply by pouring out love. Love is infectious and the greatest healing energy.

author: Isabel Allende
quote: My life is about ups and downs\\, great joys and great losses.

author: Sarah Fielding
quote: The words of kindness are more healing to a drooping heart than balm or honey.

author: George Allen\\, Sr.
quote: Forget the past - the future will give you plenty to worry about.

author: Ulysses S. Grant
quote: The art of war is simple enough. Find out where your enemy is. Get at him as soon as you can. Strike him as hard as you can\\, and keep moving on.

author: Mary Pickford
quote: You may have a fresh start any moment you choose\\, for this thing that we call 'failure' is not the falling down\\, but the staying down.

author: Helen Rowland
quote: A man never knows how to say goodbye; a woman never knows when to say it.

author: Lord Byron
quote: The heart will break\\, but broken live on.

author: Maxwell Maltz
quote: Man maintains his balance\\, poise\\, and sense of security only as he is moving forward.

author: Caleb Johnson
quote: I love being on the road. I love that lifestyle\\, traveling city to city\\, rocking out and moving on to the next place.

author: Joseph Campbell
quote: It is by going down into the abyss that we recover the treasures of life. Where you stumble\\, there lies your treasure.

author: Marcel Proust
quote: We are healed from suffering only by experiencing it to the full.

author: Kat Graham
quote: I have more of a desire to write songs about being an independent woman than being in love\\, songs about getting up and moving on even if I have a broken heart. 'Wanna Say' is one of the few love songs I've ever done.

author: Octavia Spencer
quote: You just keep moving forward and doing what you do and hope that it resonates with people. And if it doesn't\\, you just keep moving on until you find a project that does.

author: Yoko Ono
quote: Healing yourself is connected with healing others.

author: Katie Taylor
quote: I do a good job of staying positive and just moving on.

author: Samuel Beckett
quote: I can't go on. I'll go on.

author: Heidi Klum
quote: I've been heartbroken. I've broken hearts. That's part of life\\, and its part of figuring out who you are so you can find the right partner.

author: Michael W. Smith
quote: Transformation in the world happens when people are healed and start investing in other people.

author: Ashley Greene
quote: I can still love an ex as a person\\, regardless if the breakup was bad. I would never wish anything negative on them. It takes more energy to hate them than to wish them well.

author: Drake
quote: Patience is key for getting over a breakup. That\\, and trailing off your interaction after the breakup.

author: Mattie Stepanek
quote: We all have life storms\\, and when we get the rough times and we recover from them\\, we should celebrate that we got through it. No matter how bad it may seem\\, there's always something beautiful that you can find.

author: Leo Buscaglia
quote: Don't brood. Get on with living and loving. You don't have forever.

author: Ann Landers
quote: Expect trouble as an inevitable part of life and repeat to yourself\\, the most comforting words of all; this\\, too\\, shall pass.

author: Omar Khayyam
quote: The moving finger writes\\, and having written moves on. Nor all thy piety nor all thy wit\\, can cancel half a line of it.

author: Edith Piaf
quote: I think you have to pay for love with bitter tears.

author: Albert Schweitzer
quote: The willow which bends to the tempest\\, often escapes better than the oak which resists it; and so in great calamities\\, it sometimes happens that light and frivolous spirits recover their elasticity and presence of mind sooner than those of a loftier character.

author: Danica Patrick
quote: Take those chances and you can achieve greatness\\, whereas if you go conservative\\, you'll never know. I truly believe what doesn't kill you makes you stronger. Even if you fail\\, learning and moving on is sometimes the best thing.

author: Letitia Elizabeth Landon
quote: I think hearts are very much like glasses. If they do not break with the first ring\\, they usually last a considerable time.

author: Duncan Sheik
quote: I actually think sadness and darkness can be very beautiful and healing.

author: Jerry Cantrell
quote: Part of the healing process is sharing with other people who care.

author: Kat Graham
quote: I have more of a desire to write songs about being an independent woman than being in love\\, songs about getting up and moving on even if I have a broken heart.

author: Tyler Perry
quote: Everyone can relate to love\\, hurt\\, pain\\, learning how to forgive\\, needing to get over\\, needing the power of God in their life.

author: Thomas Gibson
quote: Moving on is not closure. It's not neat\\, and it's not about turning the page. It is about moving on\\, but it doesn't mean that you've left something behind.

author: David Remnick
quote: The world is a crazy\\, beautiful\\, ugly complicated place\\, and it keeps moving on from crisis to strangeness to beauty to weirdness to tragedy. The caravan keeps moving on\\, and the job of the longform writer or filmmaker or radio broadcaster is to stop - is to pause - and when the caravan goes away\\, that's when this stuff comes.

author: Demi Lovato
quote: Recovery is something that you have to work on every single day and it's something that it doesn't get a day off.

author: Elie Wiesel
quote: Because I remember\\, I despair. Because I remember\\, I have the duty to reject despair.

author: Susan Lucci
quote: Life goes on\\, and I'm moving on to the next thing\\, but I hope the soaps that are still running will thrive. They have millions of loyal viewers.

author: Joel Osteen
quote: I think faith is incredibly important because you will become overwhelmed with what's happening and you will have waves of grief\\, but when you turn to your faith\\, I believe God will give you waves of grace to get through it.

author: John Major
quote: Recovery begins from the darkest moment.

author: Ramana Maharshi
quote: The Real is ever-present\\, like the screen on which the cinematographic pictures move. While the picture appears on it\\, the screen remains invisible. Stop the picture\\, and the screen will become clear. All thoughts and events are merely pictures moving on the screen of Pure Consciousness\\, which alone is real.

author: Waris Dirie
quote: I can enjoy anywhere\\, and I can leave it. Life is about moving on.

author: Edmund Burke
quote: Never despair\\, but if you do\\, work on in despair.

author: Billy Corgan
quote: I think a spiritual journey is not so much a journey of discovery. It's a journey of recovery. It's a journey of uncovering your own inner nature. It's already there.

author: Mike Shinoda
quote: Who can't relate to the idea of leaving one chapter behind and moving on to the next?

author: Lindsay Wagner
quote: A lot of people say they want to get out of pain\\, and I'm sure that's true\\, but they aren't willing to make healing a high priority. They aren't willing to look inside to see the source of their pain in order to deal with it.

author: Phylicia Rashad
quote: There's always something to suggest that you'll never be who you wanted to be. Your choice is to take it or keep on moving.

author: Tori Amos
quote: Healing takes courage\\, and we all have courage\\, even if we have to dig a little to find it.

author: Beverley Mitchell
quote: Part of growing up is just taking what you learn from that and moving on and not taking it to heart.

author: Horace
quote: It is the false shame of fools to try to conceal wounds that have not healed.

author: Mason Cooley
quote: Only the broken-hearted know the truth about love.

author: Jack Dempsey
quote: By forgetting the past and by throwing myself into other interests\\, I forget to worry.

author: Khalil Gibran
quote: Much of your pain is the bitter potion by which the physician within you heals your sick self.

author: Carl Sandburg
quote: I tell you the past is a bucket of ashes\\, so live not in your yesterdays\\, no just for tomorrow\\, but in the here and now. Keep moving and forget the post mortems; and remember\\, no one can get the jump on the future.

author: Marianne Williamson
quote: The goal of spiritual practice is full recovery\\, and the only thing you need to recover from is a fractured sense of self.

author: Gene Tierney
quote: Some women feel the best cure for a broken heart is a new beau.

author: Iris Murdoch
quote: Falling out of love is chiefly a matter of forgetting how charming someone is.

author: Benjamin Netanyahu
quote: I can tell you one thing\\, Iran is closer to developing nuclear weapons today than it was a week ago\\, or a month ago or a year ago. It's just moving on with its efforts.

author: Jerome K. Jerome
quote: Love is like the measles; we all have to go through it.

author: Blaise Pascal
quote: Time heals griefs and quarrels\\, for we change and are no longer the same persons. Neither the offender nor the offended are any more themselves.

author: Shiv Khera
quote: I started life washing cars in Canada before moving on to selling life insurance and vacuum cleaners. Later\\, I went through a programme by Dr. Norman Vincent Peale\\, which literally changed my life. It was the turning point.

author: Billy Graham
quote: Tears shed for self are tears of weakness\\, but tears shed for others are a sign of strength.

author: Mick Jagger
quote: I must be careful not to get trapped in the past. That's why I tend to forget my songs.

author: Lara Giddings
quote: There will always be excuses\\, arguments\\, and questions of timing when moving on difficult and controversial issues.

author: Hank Azaria
quote: Getting over someone is a grieving process. You mourn the loss of the relationship\\, and that's only expedited by 'Out of sight\\, out of mind.' But when you walk outside and see them on a billboard or on TV or on the cover of a magazine\\, it reopens the wound. It's a high-class problem\\, but it's real.

author: Eli Broad
quote: Someone once told me I'm a sore winner\\, and they're right. I rarely take more than a moment to enjoy a success before I'm moving on and looking for the next challenge.

author: Emma Thompson
quote: If you've got to my age\\, you've probably had your heart broken many times. So it's not that difficult to unpack a bit of grief from some little corner of your heart and cry over it.

author: Rose Kennedy
quote: It is selfish to concern oneself with tragedies.

author: Julius Erving
quote: But you know\\, if you live an affluent lifestyle\\, there are all types of trappings that are there that you have to be cognizant of\\, and you've got to try and communicate freely and gain understanding about and then keep moving on\\, because you know\\, sometimes lifestyles are chosen for us as opposed to us choosing them.

author: Allen Klein
quote: Laughter\\, and the broader category of humor\\, are key elements in helping us go on with our life after a loss.

author: Paul Anka
quote: I've always believed that if you don't stay moving\\, they will throw dirt on you.

author: Justin Halpern
quote: I kind of came to the conclusion after I did finally get married that love and relationships are just a series of horrific losses with hopefully one win.

author: Shari Arison
quote: Many of us are experiencing a phase of change\\, shedding outdated patterns and liberating ourselves from the old by moving on to the new. The year 2012 is an important one for mankind\\, a pivotal year. The potential for this exists in the mere fact that the majority of us are yearning for change.

author: J. I. Packer
quote: I'm not against technology\\, but all tools should be used to their best advantage. We should be spending our time on things that have staying power\\, instead of on the latest thought of the latest blogger - and then moving on quickly to the next blogger.

author: Romain Rolland
quote: One makes mistakes; that is life. But it is never a mistake to have loved.

author: Barbara Sher
quote: When you start using senses you've neglected\\, your reward is to see the world with completely fresh eyes.

author: Christiaan Barnard
quote: Suffering isn't ennobling\\, recovery is.

author: Robert Wyatt
quote: I know people who grow old and bitter. I want to keep making a fresh start. I don't want them to defeat me. That would be suicidal.

author: Carrie Brownstein
quote: I'm pretty horrible at relationships and haven't been in many long-term ones. Leaving and moving on - returning to a familiar sense of self-reliance and autonomy - is what I know; that feeling is as comfortable and comforting as it might be for a different kind of person to stay.

author: Bob Marley
quote: One good thing about music\\, when it hits you\\, you feel no pain.

author: Hans Christian Andersen
quote: Where words fail\\, music speaks.

author: William Shakespeare
quote: If music be the food of love\\, play on.

author: A. J. McLean
quote: Music is love\\, love is music\\, music is life\\, and I love my life. Thank you and good night.

author: Victor Hugo
quote: Music expresses that which cannot be said and on which it is impossible to be silent.

author: Friedrich Nietzsche
quote: Without music\\, life would be a mistake.

author: P. T. Barnum
quote: To me there is no picture so beautiful as smiling\\, bright-eyed\\, happy children; no music so sweet as their clear and ringing laughter.

author: Bono
quote: Music can change the world because it can change people.

author: Plato
quote: Music is a moral law. It gives soul to the universe\\, wings to the mind\\, flight to the imagination\\, and charm and gaiety to life and to everything.

author: Lord Byron
quote: There is pleasure in the pathless woods\\, there is rapture in the lonely shore\\, there is society where none intrudes\\, by the deep sea\\, and music in its roar; I love not Man the less\\, but Nature more.

author: Jean Paul
quote: Music is moonlight in the gloomy night of life.

author: Maya Angelou
quote: Music was my refuge. I could crawl into the space between the notes and curl my back to loneliness.

author: Lou Rawls
quote: Music is the greatest communication in the world. Even if people don't understand the language that you're singing in\\, they still know good music when they hear it.

author: Lao Tzu
quote: Music in the soul can be heard by the universe.

author: Ronald Reagan
quote: Life is one grand\\, sweet song\\, so start the music.

author: Ludwig van Beethoven
quote: Music is a higher revelation than all wisdom and philosophy.

author: Albert Schweitzer
quote: There are two means of refuge from the miseries of life: music and cats.

author: Roy Ayers
quote: The true beauty of music is that it connects people. It carries a message\\, and we\\, the musicians\\, are the messengers.

author: John O'Donohue
quote: The human soul is hungry for beauty; we seek it everywhere - in landscape\\, music\\, art\\, clothes\\, furniture\\, gardening\\, companionship\\, love\\, religion\\, and in ourselves. No one would desire not to be beautiful. When we experience the beautiful\\, there is a sense of homecoming.

author: Kailash Kher
quote: Singing is my passion\\, my first love and the secret of my energy. Music to me is like finding my inner self\\, my soul. It gives me a great joy to see audiences enjoying with me. I have given my heart to singing. When I sing\\, I can feel romance in everything around me.

author: Bernie Siegel
quote: Feelings aroused by the touch of someone's hand\\, the sound of music\\, the smell of a flower\\, a beautiful sunset\\, a work of art\\, love\\, laughter\\, hope and faith - all work on both the unconscious and the conscious aspects of the self\\, and they have physiological consequences as well.

author: Tom Petty
quote: Music is probably the only real magic I have encountered in my life. There's not some trick involved with it. It's pure and it's real. It moves\\, it heals\\, it communicates and does all these incredible things.

author: Lindsey Stirling
quote: Sometimes\\, being different feels a lot like being alone. But with that being said\\, being true to that and being true to my standards and my way of doing things in my art and my music\\, everything that has made me feel very different... in the end\\, it has made me the happiest.

author: Plato
quote: Music is the movement of sound to reach the soul for the education of its virtue.

author: Berthold Auerbach
quote: Music washes away from the soul the dust of everyday life.

author: Henny Youngman
quote: Some people ask the secret of our long marriage. We take time to go to a restaurant two times a week. A little candlelight\\, dinner\\, soft music and dancing. She goes Tuesdays\\, I go Fridays.

author: Stevie Wonder
quote: Music\\, at its essence\\, is what gives us memories. And the longer a song has existed in our lives\\, the more memories we have of it.

author: Ludwig van Beethoven
quote: Music should strike fire from the heart of man\\, and bring tears from the eyes of woman.

author: will.i.am
quote: If you are a chef\\, no matter how good a chef you are\\, it's not good cooking for yourself; the joy is in cooking for others - it's the same with music.

author: James Gates Percival
quote: The world is full of poetry. The air is living with its spirit; and the waves dance to the music of its melodies\\, and sparkle in its brightness.

author: Martin Luther
quote: Next to the Word of God\\, the noble art of music is the greatest treasure in the world.

author: Aldous Huxley
quote: After silence\\, that which comes nearest to expressing the inexpressible is music.

author: Louis Armstrong
quote: Musicians don't retire; they stop when there's no more music in them.

author: E. Y. Harburg
quote: Words make you think a thought. Music makes you feel a feeling. A song makes you feel a thought.

author: Marilyn Manson
quote: Music is the strongest form of magic.

author: Henry David Thoreau
quote: If a man does not keep pace with his companions\\, perhaps it is because he hears a different drummer. Let him step to the music which he hears\\, however measured or far away.

author: Pat Conroy
quote: Without music\\, life is a journey through a desert.

author: Billy Joel
quote: I think music in itself is healing. It's an explosive expression of humanity. It's something we are all touched by. No matter what culture we're from\\, everyone loves music.

author: Ludwig van Beethoven
quote: Music is the mediator between the spiritual and the sensual life.

author: Louis Armstrong
quote: Music is life itself. What would this world be without good music? No matter what kind it is.

author: Charles Baudelaire
quote: The dance can reveal everything mysterious that is hidden in music\\, and it has the additional merit of being human and palpable. Dancing is poetry with arms and legs.

author: Elvis Presley
quote: Rock and roll music\\, if you like it\\, if you feel it\\, you can't help but move to it. That's what happens to me. I can't help it.'

author: Ashley Wagner
quote: I'm not a pretty princess\\, and I'm aware of that\\, so I like music that is really intense\\, really bold\\, and characters that in a way almost have a dark side and are kind of evil because\\, for me\\, that's when I feel my strongest and fiercest\\, when I'm not necessarily the good girl.

author: LZ Granderson
quote: Complete strangers can stand silent next to each other in an elevator and not even look each other in the eye. But at a concert\\, those same strangers could find themselves dancing and singing together like best friends. That's the power of music.

author: Edith Sitwell
quote: My personal hobbies are reading\\, listening to music\\, and silence.

author: Bob Marley
quote: My music fights against the system that teaches to live and die.

author: David Sanborn
quote: Music is an expression of individuality; it's how you see the world. All art is\\, for that matter. You take how you experience the world\\, interpret it\\, and send it out there - express it - whether it's sculpture\\, dance or singing.

author: Christina Milian
quote: I enjoy being happy every day\\, and hopefully you can hear my happiness in my music. Life is beautiful.

author: Pythagoras
quote: There is geometry in the humming of the strings\\, there is music in the spacing of the spheres.

author: Leo Tolstoy
quote: Music is the shorthand of emotion.

author: James Joseph Sylvester
quote: Mathematics is the music of reason.

author: Psy
quote: The world's most famous and popular language is music.

author: Elizabeth Berkley
quote: I will never forget experiencing Venice for the first time. It feels like you are transported to another time - the art\\, music\\, food and pure romance in the air is like no other place.

author: Samuel Butler
quote: Every man's work\\, whether it be literature\\, or music or pictures or architecture or anything else\\, is always a portrait of himself.

author: Chelsea Leyland
quote: The best thing about being a DJ is making people happy. There is nothing like seeing people get up from a table to dance or the expression on their face when they hear a song they love. I also love to educate people on music they have never heard.

author: Katy Perry
quote: I'm kind of a good girl - and I'm not. I'm a good girl because I really believe in love\\, integrity\\, and respect. I'm a bad girl because I like to tease. I know that I have sex appeal in my deck of cards. But I like to get people thinking. That's what the stories in my music do.

author: Adam Braun
quote: What can a pencil do for all of us? Amazing things. It can write transcendent poetry\\, uplifting music\\, or life-changing equations; it can sketch the future\\, give life to untold beauty\\, and communicate the full-force of our love and aspirations.

author: Chris Cornell
quote: I've always liked depressing music because a lot of times\\, listening to it when you're down can actually make you feel less depressed. Also\\, even though a person may have problems with depression\\, sometimes you can actually be kind of comfortable in that space because you know how to operate within it.

author: Ray Charles
quote: I was born with music inside me. Music was one of my parts. Like my ribs\\, my kidneys\\, my liver\\, my heart. Like my blood. It was a force already within me when I arrived on the scene. It was a necessity for me - like food or water.

author: Marilyn vos Savant
quote: Teens think listening to music helps them concentrate. It doesn't. It relieves them of the boredom that concentration on homework induces.

author: Pope Francis
quote: Together with a culture of work\\, there must be a culture of leisure as gratification. To put it another way: people who work must take the time to relax\\, to be with their families\\, to enjoy themselves\\, read\\, listen to music\\, play a sport.

author: Napoleon Bonaparte
quote: Music is the voice that tells us that the human race is greater than it knows.

author: Chris Stapleton
quote: I think the path is different for everybody. Go after the doors that are open to you. That has always been my motto getting into the music business. Do the things that seem to be good opportunities and work hard at it. Try to make good decisions and be nice. Hopefully all of that will pay off at some point.

author: Judith Viorst
quote: Close friends contribute to our personal growth. They also contribute to our personal pleasure\\, making the music sound sweeter\\, the wine taste richer\\, the laughter ring louder because they are there.

author: Eminem
quote: Sometimes I feel like rap music is almost the key to stopping racism.

author: Nat Wolff
quote: Jazz is smooth and cool. Jazz is rage. Jazz flows like water. Jazz never seems to begin or end. Jazz isn't methodical\\, but jazz isn't messy either. Jazz is a conversation\\, a give and take. Jazz is the connection and communication between musicians. Jazz is abandon.

author: Dhani Jones
quote: There's nothing better than live music. It's raw energy\\, and raw energy feeds the soul.

author: Ed Sheeran
quote: Music is a powerful tool in galvanizing people around an issue. There's no better way to get your point across than to put it in a beautiful song.

author: Bruno Mars
quote: Music is not math. It's science. You keep mixing the stuff up until it blows up on you\\, or it becomes this incredible potion.

author: Jimi Hendrix
quote: Music doesn't lie. If there is something to be changed in this world\\, then it can only happen through music.

author: Joan Miro
quote: I try to apply colors like words that shape poems\\, like notes that shape music.

author: Lady Gaga
quote: Music is one of the most powerful things the world has to offer. No matter what race or religion or nationality or sexual orientation or gender that you are\\, it has the power to unite us.

author: Elton John
quote: Music has healing power. It has the ability to take people out of themselves for a few hours.

author: Michio Kaku
quote: In string theory\\, all particles are vibrations on a tiny rubber band; physics is the harmonies on the string; chemistry is the melodies we play on vibrating strings; the universe is a symphony of strings\\, and the 'Mind of God' is cosmic music resonating in 11-dimensional hyperspace.

author: Heather Watts
quote: Arts education is a big part of building a 21st century creative mind\\, and I think that we have let way too many kids lose their way by not drawing in their young minds with music\\, dance\\, painting and the other various ways we can express those things we do not have words for.

author: Justin Timberlake
quote: I was raised in a very humble environment\\, and I was always taught to be humble to the things that are happening in my life because they're blessings. They're blessings in every way. Whether you're able to help someone get through a tough time in their life through your music or through comedy\\, or whatever it is\\, you're just a channel.

author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe
quote: I call architecture frozen music.

author: Macklemore
quote: Music is therapy. Music moves people. It connects people in ways that no other medium can. It pulls heart strings. It acts as medicine.

author: Joseph Campbell
quote: Love is a friendship set to music.

author: Johnny Cash
quote: Of emotions\\, of love\\, of breakup\\, of love and hate and death and dying\\, mama\\, apple pie\\, and the whole thing. It covers a lot of territory\\, country music does.

author: Alain Ducasse
quote: Food is one part of the experience. And it has to be somewhere between 50 to 60 percent of the dining experience. But the rest counts as well: The mood\\, the atmosphere\\, the music\\, the feeling\\, the design\\, the harmony between what you have on the plate and what surrounds the plate.

author: Jimi Hendrix
quote: Music is a safe kind of high.

author: Harry Styles
quote: That's the amazing thing about music: there's a song for every emotion. Can you imagine a world with no music? It would suck.

author: Wynton Marsalis
quote: Jazz music is America's past and its potential\\, summed up and sanctified and accessible to anybody who learns to listen to\\, feel\\, and understand it. The music can connect us to our earlier selves and to our better selves-to-come. It can remind us of where we fit on the time line of human achievement\\, an ultimate value of art.

author: Edgar Bronfman\\, Jr.
quote: The history of the music industry is inevitably also the story of the development of technology. From the player piano to the vinyl disc\\, from reel-to-reel tape to the cassette\\, from the CD to the digital download\\, these formats and devices changed not only the way music was consumed\\, but the very way artists created it.

author: Wassily Kandinsky
quote: Lend your ears to music\\, open your eyes to painting\\, and... stop thinking! Just ask yourself whether the work has enabled you to 'walk about' into a hitherto unknown world. If the answer is yes\\, what more do you want?

author: Bob Marley
quote: My music will go on forever. Maybe it's a fool say that\\, but when me know facts me can say facts. My music will go on forever.

author: Johann Sebastian Bach
quote: The aim and final end of all music should be none other than the glory of God and the refreshment of the soul.

author: Montserrat Caballe
quote: When a singer truly feels and experiences what the music is all about\\, the words will automatically ring true.

author: Frank Zappa
quote: Without music to decorate it\\, time is just a bunch of boring production deadlines or dates by which bills must be paid.

author: Nas
quote: Hip-hop is the streets. Hip-hop is a couple of elements that it comes from back in the days... that feel of music with urgency that speaks to you. It speaks to your livelihood and it's not compromised. It's blunt. It's raw\\, straight off the street - from the beat to the voice to the words.

author: Faith Hill
quote: Country music is the people's music. It just speaks about real life and about truth and it tells things how they really are.

author: Aja Naomi King
quote: If I had a free afternoon\\, I would play music\\, sit in my backyard\\, and drink coffee.

author: Eminem
quote: If people take anything from my music\\, it should be motivation to know that anything is possible as long as you keep working at it and don't back down.

author: William Lyon Phelps
quote: Those who decide to use leisure as a means of mental development\\, who love good music\\, good books\\, good pictures\\, good plays\\, good company\\, good conversation - what are they? They are the happiest people in the world.

author: Kevin Gates
quote: I suffer from deep depression\\, so my only release is music.

author: Benjamin Britten
quote: It is cruel\\, you know\\, that music should be so beautiful. It has the beauty of loneliness of pain: of strength and freedom. The beauty of disappointment and never-satisfied love. The cruel beauty of nature and everlasting beauty of monotony.

author: Glenn Hughes
quote: Listen to your inner-voice: Surround yourself with loving\\, nurturing people. Fall in love with your art and find yourself. Music is the great communicator.

author: David Bowie
quote: On the other hand\\, what I like my music to do to me is awaken the ghosts inside of me. Not the demons\\, you understand\\, but the ghosts.

author: Louis Armstrong
quote: There is two kinds of music\\, the good\\, and the bad. I play the good kind.

author: Albert Einstein
quote: Look deep into nature\\, and then you will understand everything better.

author: Hans Christian Andersen
quote: Just living is not enough... one must have sunshine\\, freedom\\, and a little flower.

author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
quote: Nature always wears the colors of the spirit.

author: Robert Frost
quote: The woods are lovely\\, dark and deep. But I have promises to keep\\, and miles to go before I sleep.

author: John Muir
quote: In every walk with nature one receives far more than he seeks.

author: Anthony J. D'Angelo
quote: Wherever you go\\, no matter what the weather\\, always bring your own sunshine.

author: Gerard De Nerval
quote: Every flower is a soul blossoming in nature.

author: Albert Camus
quote: In the depth of winter I finally learned that there was in me an invincible summer.

author: Paulo Coelho
quote: I have seen many storms in my life. Most storms have caught me by surprise\\, so I had to learn very quickly to look further and understand that I am not capable of controlling the weather\\, to exercise the art of patience and to respect the fury of nature.

author: Chantal Sutherland
quote: So many times\\, people told me I can't do this or can't do that. My nature is that I don't listen very well. I'm very determined\\, and I believe in myself. My parents brought me up that way. Thank God for that. I don't let anything stand in my way.

author: Philip James Bailey
quote: Simplicity is natures first step\\, and the last of art.

author: John Muir
quote: Keep close to Nature's heart... and break clear away\\, once in awhile\\, and climb a mountain or spend a week in the woods. Wash your spirit clean.

author: John Ruskin
quote: Sunshine is delicious\\, rain is refreshing\\, wind braces us up\\, snow is exhilarating; there is really no such thing as bad weather\\, only different kinds of good weather.

author: Theodore Roethke
quote: Over every mountain there is a path\\, although it may not be seen from the valley.

author: Mother Teresa
quote: We need to find God\\, and he cannot be found in noise and restlessness. God is the friend of silence. See how nature - trees\\, flowers\\, grass- grows in silence; see the stars\\, the moon and the sun\\, how they move in silence... We need silence to be able to touch souls.

author: Hans Hofmann
quote: In nature\\, light creates the color. In the picture\\, color creates the light.

author: George Santayana
quote: The family is one of nature's masterpieces.

author: Andre Norton
quote: There's no night without stars.

author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
quote: Adopt the pace of nature: her secret is patience.

author: Jacques Yves Cousteau
quote: The sea\\, once it casts its spell\\, holds one in its net of wonder forever.

author: Pedro Calderon de la Barca
quote: Green is the prime color of the world\\, and that from which its loveliness arises.

author: Pamela Hansford Johnson
quote: The sky broke like an egg into full sunset and the water caught fire.

author: Mattie Stepanek
quote: Sunset is still my favorite color\\, and rainbow is second.

author: Frank Lloyd Wright
quote: Study nature\\, love nature\\, stay close to nature. It will never fail you.

author: Albert Einstein
quote: Joy in looking and comprehending is nature's most beautiful gift.

author: Lord Byron
quote: There is pleasure in the pathless woods\\, there is rapture in the lonely shore\\, there is society where none intrudes\\, by the deep sea\\, and music in its roar; I love not Man the less\\, but Nature more.

author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow
quote: The best thing one can do when it's raining is to let it rain.

author: Alice Walker
quote: In nature\\, nothing is perfect and everything is perfect. Trees can be contorted\\, bent in weird ways\\, and they're still beautiful.

author: John Muir
quote: The clearest way into the Universe is through a forest wilderness.

author: Andy Goldsworthy
quote: Even in winter an isolated patch of snow has a special quality.

author: Eleonora Duse
quote: If the sight of the blue skies fills you with joy\\, if a blade of grass springing up in the fields has power to move you\\, if the simple things of nature have a message that you understand\\, rejoice\\, for your soul is alive.

author: Stanislaw Jerzy Lec
quote: Youth is the gift of nature\\, but age is a work of art.

author: John Lubbock
quote: Sunsets are so beautiful that they almost seem as if we were looking through the gates of Heaven.

author: Ingrid Bergman
quote: A kiss is a lovely trick designed by nature to stop speech when words become superfluous.

author: Leigh Hunt
quote: Colors are the smiles of nature.

author: Khalil Gibran
quote: Forget not that the earth delights to feel your bare feet and the winds long to play with your hair.

author: Roger Miller
quote: Some people walk in the rain\\, others just get wet.

author: John Lubbock
quote: Earth and sky\\, woods and fields\\, lakes and rivers\\, the mountain and the sea\\, are excellent schoolmasters\\, and teach some of us more than we can ever learn from books.

author: Andy Warhol
quote: Land really is the best art.

author: Rabindranath Tagore
quote: Trees are the earth's endless effort to speak to the listening heaven.

author: Duke Ellington
quote: Gray skies are just clouds passing over.

author: Theodore Roethke
quote: Deep in their roots\\, all flowers keep the light.

author: Voltaire
quote: The art of medicine consists in amusing the patient while nature cures the disease.

author: Percy Bysshe Shelley
quote: O\\, wind\\, if winter comes\\, can spring be far behind?

author: Edward Abbey
quote: May your trails be crooked\\, winding\\, lonesome\\, dangerous\\, leading to the most amazing view. May your mountains rise into and above the clouds.

author: Socrates
quote: He is richest who is content with the least\\, for content is the wealth of nature.

author: Dale Carnegie
quote: One of the most tragic things I know about human nature is that all of us tend to put off living. We are all dreaming of some magical rose garden over the horizon instead of enjoying the roses that are blooming outside our windows today.

author: Tom Hanks
quote: Truth is\\, I'll never know all there is to know about you just as you will never know all there is to know about me. Humans are by nature too complicated to be understood fully. So\\, we can choose either to approach our fellow human beings with suspicion or to approach them with an open mind\\, a dash of optimism and a great deal of candour.

author: Langston Hughes
quote: Let the rain kiss you. Let the rain beat upon your head with silver liquid drops. Let the rain sing you a lullaby.

author: Rabindranath Tagore
quote: The butterfly counts not months but moments\\, and has time enough.

author: Louie Schwartzberg
quote: Nature's beauty is a gift that cultivates appreciation and gratitude.

author: Dag Hammarskjold
quote: Never measure the height of a mountain until you have reached the top. Then you will see how low it was.

author: Vincent Van Gogh
quote: For my part I know nothing with any certainty\\, but the sight of the stars makes me dream.

author: Albert Camus
quote: Autumn is a second spring when every leaf is a flower.

author: Alexander Hamilton
quote: There is a certain enthusiasm in liberty\\, that makes human nature rise above itself\\, in acts of bravery and heroism.

author: Julie Bowen
quote: I'm so not stylish by nature\\, but I've learned to work with what I have.

author: Robin Williams
quote: Spring is nature's way of saying\\, 'Let's party!'

author: Frederick Douglass
quote: It is not light that we need\\, but fire; it is not the gentle shower\\, but thunder. We need the storm\\, the whirlwind\\, and the earthquake.

author: Vladimir Nabokov
quote: The breaking of a wave cannot explain the whole sea.

author: Carl Reiner
quote: A lot of people like snow. I find it to be an unnecessary freezing of water.

author: John Updike
quote: Rain is grace; rain is the sky descending to the earth; without rain\\, there would be no life.

author: Abraham Lincoln
quote: Slavery is founded in the selfishness of man's nature - opposition to it is his love of justice. These principles are an eternal antagonism; and when brought into collision so fiercely\\, as slavery extension brings them\\, shocks and throes and convulsions must ceaselessly follow.

author: Nikola Tesla
quote: Modern science says: 'The sun is the past\\, the earth is the present\\, the moon is the future.' From an incandescent mass we have originated\\, and into a frozen mass we shall turn. Merciless is the law of nature\\, and rapidly and irresistibly we are drawn to our doom.

author: Leonardo da Vinci
quote: Water is the driving force of all nature.

author: John Muir
quote: The mountains are calling and I must go.

author: Henry Beston
quote: The three great elemental sounds in nature are the sound of rain\\, the sound of wind in a primeval wood\\, and the sound of outer ocean on a beach.

author: Henri Matisse
quote: There are always flowers for those who want to see them.

author: Plautus
quote: The day\\, water\\, sun\\, moon\\, night - I do not have to purchase these things with money.

author: Aristotle
quote: Man is by nature a political animal.

author: Denis Diderot
quote: There are three principal means of acquiring knowledge... observation of nature\\, reflection\\, and experimentation. Observation collects facts; reflection combines them; experimentation verifies the result of that combination.

author: Jules Renard
quote: On earth there is no heaven\\, but there are pieces of it.

author: Swami Vivekananda
quote: External nature is only internal nature writ large.

author: Georges Simenon
quote: The lake and the mountains have become my landscape\\, my real world.

author: R. Buckminster Fuller
quote: There is nothing in a caterpillar that tells you it's going to be a butterfly.

author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
quote: The earth laughs in flowers.

author: John Muir
quote: Everybody needs beauty as well as bread\\, places to play in and pray in\\, where nature may heal and give strength to body and soul.

author: Richard Bach
quote: What the caterpillar calls the end of the world the master calls a butterfly.

author: Thomas Hobbes
quote: The right of nature... is the liberty each man hath to use his own power\\, as he will himself\\, for the preservation of his own nature; that is to say\\, of his own life.

author: Elizabeth I
quote: Fear not\\, we are of the nature of the lion\\, and cannot descend to the destruction of mice and such small beasts.

author: Alfred Austin
quote: The glory of gardening: hands in the dirt\\, head in the sun\\, heart with nature. To nurture a garden is to feed not just on the body\\, but the soul.

author: Bryan Batt
quote: I'm in love with red. I think it's such a passionate color. Every flag of every country pretty much has red it it. It's power\\, there's no fence sitting with red. Either you love it or you don't. I think its blood and strength and life. I do love red. I love all colors. Great shades of blue\\, you find them in nature. They're all magic.

author: Hal Borland
quote: Knowing trees\\, I understand the meaning of patience. Knowing grass\\, I can appreciate persistence.

author: Henrik Ibsen
quote: A forest bird never wants a cage.

author: Alex Trebek
quote: If you can't be in awe of Mother Nature\\, there's something wrong with you.

author: Henry Ward Beecher
quote: Every artist dips his brush in his own soul\\, and paints his own nature into his pictures.

author: Larry Wilcox
quote: Another thing I like to do is sit back and take in nature. To look at the birds\\, listen to their singing\\, go hiking\\, camping and jogging and running\\, walking along the beach\\, playing games and sometimes being alone with the great outdoors. It's very special to me.

author: Radhanath Swami
quote: Mother Nature is always speaking. She speaks in a language understood within the peaceful mind of the sincere observer. Leopards\\, cobras\\, monkeys\\, rivers and trees; they all served as my teachers when I lived as a wanderer in the Himalayan foothills.

author: Robert Baden-Powell
quote: Juvenile crime is not naturally born in the boy\\, but is largely due either to the spirit of adventure that is in him\\, to his own stupidity\\, or to his lack of discipline\\, according to the nature of the individual.

author: E. O. Wilson
quote: Nature holds the key to our aesthetic\\, intellectual\\, cognitive and even spiritual satisfaction.

author: Pat Buckley
quote: I can find God in nature\\, in animals\\, in birds and the environment.

author: Edward Abbey
quote: Wilderness is not a luxury but a necessity of the human spirit.

author: Walt Whitman
quote: Give me odorous at sunrise a garden of beautiful flowers where I can walk undisturbed.

author: Diane Ackerman
quote: Nothing is more memorable than a smell. One scent can be unexpected\\, momentary and fleeting\\, yet conjure up a childhood summer beside a lake in the mountains.

author: Karen Salmansohn
quote: Do activities you're passionate about - which make your heart and soul feel perky - including things like working out\\, cooking\\, painting\\, writing\\, yoga\\, hiking\\, walking\\, swimming\\, being in nature\\, being around art\\, or reading inspiring books.

author: Matsuo Basho
quote: The temple bell stops but I still hear the sound coming out of the flowers.

author: Marilyn Monroe
quote: Sex is a part of nature. I go along with nature.

author: Michelangelo
quote: My soul can find no staircase to Heaven unless it be through Earth's loveliness.

author: Walt Whitman
quote: I believe a leaf of grass is no less than the journey-work of the stars.

author: Robert Louis Stevenson
quote: It is not so much for its beauty that the forest makes a claim upon men's hearts\\, as for that subtle something\\, that quality of air that emanation from old trees\\, that so wonderfully changes and renews a weary spirit.

author: John Donne
quote: Nature's great masterpiece\\, an elephant; the only harmless great thing.

author: Neil Gaiman
quote: I hope that in this year to come\\, you make mistakes. Because if you are making mistakes\\, then you are making new things\\, trying new things\\, learning\\, living\\, pushing yourself\\, changing yourself\\, changing your world. You're doing things you've never done before\\, and more importantly\\, you're doing something.

author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
quote: Write it on your heart that every day is the best day in the year.

author: Rainer Maria Rilke
quote: And now we welcome the new year. Full of things that have never been.

author: Helen Keller
quote: Your success and happiness lies in you. Resolve to keep happy\\, and your joy and you shall form an invincible host against difficulties.

author: Oprah Winfrey
quote: Cheers to a new year and another chance for us to get it right.

author: Sarah Ban Breathnach
quote: New Year's Day. A fresh start. A new chapter in life waiting to be written. New questions to be asked\\, embraced\\, and loved. Answers to be discovered and then lived in this transformative year of delight and self-discovery. Today carve out a quiet interlude for yourself in which to dream\\, pen in hand. Only dreams give birth to change.

author: Melody Beattie
quote: The new year stands before us\\, like a chapter in a book\\, waiting to be written. We can help write that story by setting goals.

author: Alfred Lord Tennyson
quote: Hope smiles from the threshold of the year to come\\, whispering\\, 'It will be happier.'

author: Sarah Ban Breathnach
quote: Take a leap of faith and begin this wondrous new year by believing. Believe in yourself. And believe that there is a loving Source - a Sower of Dreams - just waiting to be asked to help you make your dreams come true.

author: F. Scott Fitzgerald
quote: First you take a drink\\, then the drink takes a drink\\, then the drink takes you.

author: Diogenes
quote: What I like to drink most is wine that belongs to others.

author: Tom Peters
quote: Celebrate what you want to see more of.

author: William Shakespeare
quote: Come\\, gentlemen\\, I hope we shall drink down all unkindness.

author: Benjamin Franklin
quote: Be at war with your vices\\, at peace with your neighbors\\, and let every new year find you a better man.

author: Cyril Cusack
quote: If you asked me for my New Year Resolution\\, it would be to find out who I am.

author: Hal Borland
quote: Year's end is neither an end nor a beginning but a going on\\, with all the wisdom that experience can instill in us.

author: Goran Persson
quote: Let our New Year's resolution be this: we will be there for one another as fellow members of humanity\\, in the finest sense of the word.

author: W. C. Fields
quote: I never worry about being driven to drink; I just worry about being driven home.

author: Steven Spielberg
quote: All of us every single year\\, we're a different person. I don't think we're the same person all our lives.

author: W. Somerset Maugham
quote: At a dinner party one should eat wisely but not too well\\, and talk well but not too wisely.

author: Alfred Lord Tennyson
quote: Ring out the false\\, ring in the true.

author: Charles Lamb
quote: New Year's Day is every man's birthday.

author: Charles Kettering
quote: Every time you tear a leaf off a calendar\\, you present a new place for new ideas and progress.

author: James Lafferty
quote: My New Year's resolution is to stick to a good workout plan that will keep me healthy and happy.

author: Jonathan Edwards
quote: Resolution One: I will live for God. Resolution Two: If no one else does\\, I still will.

author: Mark Twain
quote: Sometimes too much to drink is barely enough.

author: Catherine O'Hara
quote: I know. I'm lazy. But I made myself a New Years resolution that I would write myself something really special. Which means I have 'til December\\, right?

author: Henry Moore
quote: I think in terms of the day's resolutions\\, not the years'.

author: Carl Sandburg
quote: I doubt if you can have a truly wild party without liquor.

author: Akhenaton
quote: Those who gave thee a body\\, furnished it with weakness; but He who gave thee Soul\\, armed thee with resolution. Employ it\\, and thou art wise; be wise and thou art happy.

author: Natalie Portman
quote: Going to a party\\, for me\\, is as much a learning experience as\\, you know\\, sitting in a lecture.

author: Cavett Robert
quote: Character is the ability to carry out a good resolution long after the excitement of the moment has passed.

author: James Agate
quote: New Year's Resolution: To tolerate fools more gladly\\, provided this does not encourage them to take up more of my time.

author: Walter Scott
quote: Each age has deemed the new-born year the fittest time for festal cheer.

author: Debbie Harry
quote: I've had some lovely extraordinary experiences on New Year's Eve.

author: Phil McGraw
quote: A year from now\\, you're gonna weigh more or less than what you do right now.

author: Melody Beattie
quote: Make New Year's goals. Dig within\\, and discover what you would like to have happen in your life this year. This helps you do your part. It is an affirmation that you're interested in fully living life in the year to come.

author: Mason Cooley
quote: Good parties create a temporary youthfulness.

author: William Makepeace Thackeray
quote: Dinner was made for eating\\, not for talking.

author: Robert Fulghum
quote: If you want an interesting party sometime\\, combine cocktails and a fresh box of crayons for everyone.

author: William C. Bryant
quote: And suns grow meek\\, and the meek suns grow brief\\, and the year smiles as it draws near its death.

author: Wally Lamb
quote: Accept what people offer. Drink their milkshakes. Take their love.

author: Gilbert K. Chesterton
quote: The object of a New Year is not that we should have a new year. It is that we should have a new soul and a new nose; new feet\\, a new backbone\\, new ears\\, and new eyes. Unless a particular man made New Year resolutions\\, he would make no resolutions. Unless a man starts afresh about things\\, he will certainly do nothing effective.

author: Tucker Carlson
quote: I have no way of knowing how people really feel\\, but the vast majority of those I meet couldn't be nicer. Every once in a while someone barks at me. My New Year's resolution is not to bark back.

author: Samuel Pepys
quote: Strange to see how a good dinner and feasting reconciles everybody.

author: Aeschylus
quote: What is there more kindly than the feeling between host and guest?

author: E. W. Howe
quote: To be an ideal guest\\, stay at home.

author: Bobby Bowden
quote: To have the kind of year you want to have\\, something has to happen that you can't explain why it happened. Something has to happen that you can't coach.

author: Nia Vardalos
quote: My New Year's Resolution List usually starts with the desire to lose between ten and three thousand pounds.

author: Barbara Walters
quote: Deep breaths are very helpful at shallow parties.

author: P. J. O'Rourke
quote: If you are young and you drink a great deal it will spoil your health\\, slow your mind\\, make you fat - in other words\\, turn you into an adult.

author: Kim Kardashian
quote: I don't even drink! I can't stand the taste of alcohol. Every New Year's Eve I try one drink and every time it makes me feel sick. So I don't touch booze - I'm always the designated driver.

author: Joe Jonas
quote: I had a New Year's kiss once. But it was like\\, 'Let's start the year off together\\,' and then we wound up breaking up the night after!

author: Mary-Kate Olsen
quote: I like to go to parties where I know everyone. How are you going to have fun with people you don't know?

author: Ben Stiller
quote: My parents used to throw great New Year's Eve parties. They invited such an eclectic mix of showbiz people. All those cool people were always hanging out at our apartment.

author: Fergie
quote: Dick Clark will be truly missed. We will carry on his legacy every New Year's Eve.

author: Neil Gaiman
quote: I hope that in this year to come\\, you make mistakes. Because if you are making mistakes\\, then you are making new things\\, trying new things\\, learning\\, living\\, pushing yourself\\, changing yourself\\, changing your world. You're doing things you've never done before\\, and more importantly\\, you're doing something.

author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
quote: Write it on your heart that every day is the best day in the year.

author: Rainer Maria Rilke
quote: And now we welcome the new year. Full of things that have never been.

author: Helen Keller
quote: Your success and happiness lies in you. Resolve to keep happy\\, and your joy and you shall form an invincible host against difficulties.

quote: Cheers to a new year and another chance for us to get it right.

author: William Shakespeare

author: Cyril Cusack
quote: If you asked me for my New Year Resolution\\, it would be to find out who I am.

author: Hal Borland
quote: Year's end is neither an end nor a beginning but a going on\\, with all the wisdom that experience can instill in us.

author: Goran Persson
quote: Let our New Year's resolution be this: we will be there for one another as fellow members of humanity\\, in the finest sense of the word.

author: W. C. Fields
quote: I never worry about being driven to drink; I just worry about being driven home.

author: Frederick Douglass
quote: It is easier to build strong children than to repair broken men.

author: Gena Lee Nolin
quote: My children are the reason I laugh\\, smile and want to get up every morning.

author: Henry Ward Beecher
quote: We never know the love of a parent till we become parents ourselves.

author: Billy Graham
quote: A child who is allowed to be disrespectful to his parents will not have true respect for anyone.

author: Jane D. Hull
quote: At the end of the day\\, the most overwhelming key to a child's success is the positive involvement of parents.

author: Charles R. Swindoll
quote: Each day of our lives we make deposits in the memory banks of our children.

author: Robert Fulghum
quote: Don't worry that children never listen to you; worry that they are always watching you.

author: Sigmund Freud
quote: I cannot think of any need in childhood as strong as the need for a father's protection.

author: Taylor Hanson
quote: Having a baby is a life-changer. It gives you a whole other perspective on why you wake up every day.

author: James E. Faust
quote: To be a good father and mother requires that the parents defer many of their own needs and desires in favor of the needs of their children. As a consequence of this sacrifice\\, conscientious parents develop a nobility of character and learn to put into practice the selfless truths taught by the Savior Himself.

author: Plato
quote: Let parents bequeath to their children not riches\\, but the spirit of reverence.

author: Frank A. Clark
quote: A baby is born with a need to be loved - and never outgrows it.

author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe
quote: There are only two lasting bequests we can hope to give our children. One of these is roots\\, the other\\, wings.

author: Helen Hayes
quote: Childhood is a short season.

author: Carl Jung
quote: Children are educated by what the grown-up is and not by his talk.

author: Jackie Kennedy
quote: If you bungle raising your children\\, I don't think whatever else you do matters very much.

author: H. Jackson Brown\\, Jr.
quote: Always kiss your children goodnight\\, even if they're already asleep.

author: Virginia Satir
quote: Every word\\, facial expression\\, gesture\\, or action on the part of a parent gives the child some message about self-worth. It is sad that so many parents don't realize what messages they are sending.

author: GloZell
quote: Parenting is not giving your child everything they want. Parenting is not being your child's friend. Parenting is about preparing your child to be a useful and respectful person in society.

author: Ogden Nash
quote: Parents were invented to make children happy by giving them something to ignore.

author: Ellen Key
quote: At every step the child should be allowed to meet the real experience of life; the thorns should never be plucked from his roses.

author: Rose Kennedy
quote: When you hold your baby in your arms the first time\\, and you think of all the things you can say and do to influence him\\, it's a tremendous responsibility. What you do with him can influence not only him\\, but everyone he meets and not for a day or a month or a year but for time and eternity.

author: Ayelet Waldman
quote: There are times as a parent when you realize that your job is not to be the parent you always imagined you'd be\\, the parent you always wished you had. Your job is to be the parent your child needs\\, given the particulars of his or her own life and nature.

author: Andrew J. Bernstein
quote: The number of stressors has multiplied exponentially: traffic\\, money\\, success\\, work/life balance\\, the economy\\, the environment\\, parenting\\, family conflict\\, relationships\\, disease. As the nature of human life has become far more complicated\\, our ancient stress response hasn't been able to keep up.

author: Ben Stein
quote: Screaming at children over their grades\\, especially to the point of the child's tears\\, is child abuse\\, pure and simple. It's not funny and it's not good parenting. It is a crushing\\, scarring\\, disastrous experience for the child. It isn't the least bit funny.

author: Benjamin Spock
quote: The child supplies the power but the parents have to do the steering.

author: Mitt Romney
quote: My mom and dad gave their kids the greatest gift of all - the gift of unconditional love. They cared deeply about who we would be\\, and much less about what we would do.

author: Princess Diana
quote: Hugs can do great amounts of good - especially for children.

author: Robert Casey
quote: Abortion is defended today as a means of ensuring the equality and independence of women\\, and as a solution to the problems of single parenting\\, child abuse\\, and the feminization of poverty.

author: Liam Neeson
quote: Every cliche about kids is true; they grow up so quickly\\, you blink and they're gone\\, and you have to spend the time with them now. But that's a joy.

author: Bob Filner
quote: Childhood obesity is best tackled at home through improved parental involvement\\, increased physical exercise\\, better diet and restraint from eating.

author: Juhi Chawla
quote: Parenting now is a two-way relationship where you learn from each other.

author: Brene Brown
quote: I'm not a parenting expert. In fact\\, I'm not sure that I even believe in the idea of 'parenting experts.' I'm an engaged\\, imperfect parent and a passionate researcher. I'm an experienced mapmaker and a stumbling traveler. Like many of you\\, parenting is by far my boldest and most daring adventure.

author: P. J. O'Rourke
quote: Everybody knows how to raise children\\, except the people who have them.

author: Jourdan Dunn
quote: The unconditional love for you child\\, it's truly amazing.

author: Ben Carson
quote: There is no job more important than parenting. This I believe.

author: Olivia Newton-John
quote: To me luxury is to be at home with my daughter\\, and the occasional massage doesn't hurt.

author: Nadia Boulanger
quote: Loving a child doesn't mean giving in to all his whims; to love him is to bring out the best in him\\, to teach him to love what is difficult.

author: Erma Bombeck
quote: Never lend your car to anyone to whom you have given birth.

author: Anne Sullivan
quote: It's a great mistake\\, I think\\, to put children off with falsehoods and nonsense\\, when their growing powers of observation and discrimination excite in them a desire to know about things.

author: Miriam Makeba
quote: Girls are the future mothers of our society\\, and it is important that we focus on their well-being.

author: Brene Brown
quote: If I feel good about my parenting\\, I have no interest in judging other people's choices. If I feel good about my body\\, I don't go around making fun of other people's weight or appearance. We're hard on each other because we're using each other as a launching pad out of our own perceived deficiency.

author: Lee Strobel
quote: My worldview\\, my philosophy\\, my attitudes\\, my relationships\\, my parenting\\, my marriage - everything has been transformed by my relationship with Christ.

author: Marjorie Holmes
quote: What feeling is so nice as a child's hand in yours? So small\\, so soft and warm\\, like a kitten huddling in the shelter of your clasp.

author: Polly Berrien Berends
quote: The gain is not the having of children; it is the discovery of love and how to be loving.

author: Garrison Keillor
quote: Nothing you do for children is ever wasted. They seem not to notice us\\, hovering\\, averting our eyes\\, and they seldom offer thanks\\, but what we do for them is never wasted.

author: Ron Taffel
quote: Even as kids reach adolescence\\, they need more than ever for us to watch over them. Adolescence is not about letting go. It's about hanging on during a very bumpy ride.

author: Sebastian Coe
quote: Nobody ever becomes an expert parent. But I think good parenting is about consistency. It's about being there at big moments\\, but it's also just the consistency of decision making. And it's routine.

author: Luther Burbank
quote: If we had paid no more attention to our plants than we have to our children\\, we would now be living in a jungle of weed.

author: Denis Waitley
quote: Listen to the desires of your children. Encourage them and then give them the autonomy to make their own decision.

author: John F. Kennedy
quote: Mothers all want their sons to grow up to be president\\, but they don't want them to become politicians in the process.

author: Temple Grandin
quote: Autism is a neurological disorder. It's not caused by bad parenting. It's caused by\\, you know\\, abnormal development in the brain. The emotional circuits in the brain are abnormal. And there also are differences in the white matter\\, which is the brain's computer cables that hook up the different brain departments.

author: Alan Thicke
quote: Family involvement is a valuable thing and playing together actively can be the '90s version of it. Instead of just watching\\, you can do it together... something we don't spend enough time on. We can motivate and excite each other about fitness.

author: Brene Brown
quote: The uncertainty of parenting can bring up feelings in us that range from frustration to terror.

author: Eric McCormack
